other_title: How clumsy you are, Miss Ueno.
opening_theme: "Hirameki Heartbeat (閃きハートビート)" by Miku Itou
ending_theme: #1: "My Pace Science" by Ueno (Yuu Serizawa), Tanaka (Aimi Tanaka), Yamashita (Akari Kageyama) (eps 2-3)
#2: "Love Me Science (ラブミーサイエンス)" by Ueno (Yuu Serizawa) (eps 4-5)
#3: "Houkago Traveler (放課後トラベラー)" by Ueno (Yuu Serizawa) (eps 6-7)
#4: "Cosmo Lumina (コスモルミナ)" by Ueno (Yuu Serizawa) (eps 8-9)
#5: "Bukiyou Sensation (不器用センセーション)" by Ueno (Yuu Serizawa) (eps 10-11)
#6: "Kokoro no Furiko (心のふりこ)" by Ueno (Yuu Serizawa) (ep 12)
